ModMetaData.name: Misc. XPatches CE
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
Load this AFTER Combat Extended and Miscellaneous Mods
This mod makes the following Miscellaneous Mods compatible to Combat Extended:
- Miscellaneous 'CORE'
- Misc. TurretBase, Objects --- Note: Because of some incompatibilities the turret bases are currently disabled. The remaining objects are working.
The following Miscellaneous Mods can be used in CE without patching:
- Misc. Bees and Honey
- Misc. TrainingFacility
- Misc. Robots
- Misc. WeaponRepair
- Misc. MapGenerator / Urban / Factionbases
- Misc. Incidents
- Misc. EndGame
